name: Intergalactic Inspection
description:
Intergalactic Inspection is a serious-game made in 8 weeks in a group of 5 people.

The game is set in the year 2200 in a utopian society after humans have fled the earth due to climate change.

Due to time constraints the game ended up not being able to be finished.

The serious-game was developed by: 

Jack Hulspas, Giovanny Brugge, Jowan de Ruiter, Jasmijn Korving and Dianne Kotvis.
